parameters.name: colnull
parameters.description: color name for null urn balls

parameters.name: colnullname
parameters.description: word used for color null name

parameters.name: urn1bias2
parameters.description: bias toward color 2 for urn 1. Biases should sum to less than or equal to 1.0; grey will fill the rest.

parameters.name: urn2bias2
parameters.description: bias toward color 2 for urn 2. Biases should sum to less than or equal to 1.0; grey will fill the rest.

parameters.name: drawlimit
parameters.description: Max number of balls that can be drawn

parameters.name: trialsperjar
parameters.description: Number of draw trials for each jar.  Total test has 2x this number of balls.

parameters.name: correctbonus
parameters.description: Bonus for making a correct response

parameters.name: incorrectbonus
parameters.description: cost for making an incorrect response

parameters.name: binsize
parameters.description: Number of balls in the bin.
